overview: Four stories of couples who love to play sexy games with each other. A housewife "spills" coffee on herself so her husband can "punish" her. Another couple pretends to be strangers as he picks her up in a park. Vienna pretends her boyfriend is her "ex" so she can have makeup sex with him. And Aria plays a prank on her husband by having her BBF hit on him in a bar.
title: Games Lovers Play
